snippet: The White House said President Obama would deliver an address on the importance of enduring ties between the United States and Germany, and of the trans-Atlantic alliance more broadly, in Berlin on June 19.
abstract: The White House said President Obama would deliver an address on the importance of enduring ties between the United States and Germany, and of the trans-Atlantic alliance more broadly, in Berlin on June 19.

headline.main: Obama to Speak at Brandenburg Gate During Berlin Visit
